name: Knife To Meet You - first 15 levels demo
name_original: Knife To Meet You - first 15 levels demo
description:
IMPORTANT: This demo version contains the first 15 leves WITHOUT ANY LIMITATION. It has a lot of bugs, but it's playable, and it's main purpose is to showing you and getting feedbacks how to continue the development.

Can you hit it? Be the Knife Master who makes the most stunning tricks! You can do whatever you want, and complete a level in different ways. You have 10 knives, and you need to complete the RED tricks to finish the levels without hitting your little friend: the Ring Master. All in bullet time slow mo! Break the world record and send your replay to the leaderboard!

Tricks you can do:

Target hits scoring 0-500 points!

Double and triple combo 200-300 points!

Hat Trick: hit your friend's hat without hitting him!

Team Trick: pass a knife to your friend and make it hit something!

Backhand Trick: Throw with reverse spin and hit a target!

Spin Trick: Spin the knife at least 450 degrees before hitting the target!

Air Trick: Triple combo an object but in different order! For example: throw a knife in the air and hit and object twice with your 2-3. knife and let the first one finishes the combo.

Pierce Trick: as a thrid phase of the combo, hit the middle of an object to pierce it. Your knife will fly on with the object in it.

Pin Trick: Pin a knife with a pierced object to another object.
